title: Office of Traffic Safety Grant Supports SCPD's Pedestrian and Bicycle Safety Initiatives (City of Santa ...
text: ( Source : City of Santa Clara, CA ) The Santa Clara Police Department was awarded a $50, 000 grant in Fiscal Year 2014/ 2015 from the California Office of Traffic Safety ( OTS ) through the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration . From
